text: Saint-Pol-sur-Mer is a former commune in Nord department in north France. Since 9 December 2010, it is part of the commune of Dunkirk.La Voix du Nord 8 December 2010Commune de Saint-Pol-sur-Mer (59540), commune associ√©e INSEE In 2019, 20,250 people lived there. It is the second-largest suburb of the city of Dunkirk. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Former communes in Nord Category:Dunkirk
title: Saint-Pol-sur-Mer
